name: My Coloring Book: Transport
description: This is a game which will help you spend your time in the best way possible! Be creative and make masterpieces using this wonderful game we have prepared for you.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Core2Duo or better Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 or better Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: any
